Package org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class ReconTypeBase

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.ReconTypeBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReconTypeHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReconTypeById, ReconTypeByQuery
public abstract class ReconTypeBase extends Object implements ReconTypeHandler
A base class for reconciliation type handling

    • isRunTargetPhase

      public boolean isRunTargetPhase()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the target phase should be executed for this recon.
      Specified by:
      isRunTargetPhase in interface ReconTypeHandler
      Returns:
      true if the target phase should be executed for this recon, false if not

    • allowEmptySourceSet

      public boolean allowEmptySourceSet()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the recon should allow an empty source set.
      Specified by:
      allowEmptySourceSet in interface ReconTypeHandler
      Returns:

    • calcEffectiveConfig

      protected org.forgerock.json.JsonValue calcEffectiveConfig(String configPropertyName)
      Calculate the effective configuration for the given configuration property Properties passed with the request body are given precedence, they override the default configuration If not overridden by request body, the static configuration is used
      Parameters:
      configPropertyName - The name of the configuration property
      Returns:
      the effective configuration; may be null if neither an override or static configuration is provided

    • calcEffectiveQuery

      protected org.forgerock.json.JsonValue calcEffectiveQuery(String queryConfigPropertyName, String mappingResource)
      Calculate the effective query, taking into account config overrides in the request, as well as defaults
      Parameters:
      queryConfigPropertyName - The property name in the configuration for this query
      mappingResource - the resource name in the mapping that this query relates to. Used to default the resource the query will be sent to
      Returns:
      the effecive query

    • specifiesQuery

      protected boolean specifiesQuery(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue queryCfg)
      Parameters:
      queryCfg - The effective query configuration
      Returns:
      true if the effective query configuration explicitly defines the query to execute, false if not

    • query

      protected ReconQueryResult query(String objectSet, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue query, ReconciliationContext reconContext, Collection<String> collectionToPopulate, boolean caseSensitive, ReconTypeBase.QuerySide querySide, int pageSize, String pagingCookie) throws SynchronizationException
      Execute the specified query
      Parameters:
      objectSet - the object set to query
      query - the query parameters
      collectionToPopulate - the collection to populate with results
      caseSensitive - whether the collection should be populated in case sensitive fashion, or if false it populates as lower case only
      pageSize - the page size if paging
      pagingCookie - the cookie to use if paging, null if first page
      reconContext - the RconciliationContext object associated with this recon
      querySide - an indicator for which side of a reconciliation (source or target) a query is for
      Returns:
      a ReconQueryResult containing the collection of (unqualified) ids
      Throws:
      SynchronizationException - if retrieving or processing the ids failed

    • querySource

      public abstract ReconQueryResult querySource(int pageSize, String pagingCookie) throws SynchronizationException
      Description copied from interface: ReconTypeHandler
      Performs a source query returning a ReconQueryResult object containing the query results.
      Specified by:
      querySource in interface ReconTypeHandler
      Parameters:
      pageSize - a page size for the query. The value should be 0 if not paging.
      pagingCookie - an optional pagingCookie. The value should be null if not used.
      Returns:
      a ReconQueryResult object containing the query results.
      Throws:
      SynchronizationException

    • queryTarget

      public abstract ResultIterable queryTarget() throws SynchronizationException
      Description copied from interface: ReconTypeHandler
      Performs a source query returning an ResultIterable object containing the query results.
      Specified by:
      queryTarget in interface ReconTypeHandler
      Returns:
      the target identifiers and optional values to reconcile. Can be a sub-set of target identifiers.
      Throws:
      SynchronizationException
